body:
Lets to my points about this patch:

1. Not every applications would be beneficed by this feature.
1. Reading the code it is clearly a copy of the errors feature (what could mean you can use it instead of adding a new structure to Rails)
1. You can archive the same thing using the reflection API to get what validations the field has and building the hints without need to create a new structure to it on the framework
1. There are gems doing this without use the validations API that, IMO, is not the right way to do it https://github.com/plataformatec/simple_form/blob/master/lib/simple_form/components/hints.rb https://github.com/justinfrench/formtastic
